note:
Design + dev + data in public policy research. (web, TS/JS, D3, build data interfaces mostly for fed + state govts) Formerly (/always) architecture + history of architecture. General interests: information ∩ language ∩ visual representation, history of quantification, food, being sporty, bad puns.

Here to learn, be helpful, connect people and ideas across disciplines, and lol.
